scripts.start:electron:web: NODE_ENV=development ejs-cli src/electron/index.ejs > public/electron/index.html && NODE_ENV=development env-cmd .env  budo src/electron/index.js:bundle.js --cors --hot --live --dir public/electron --port 7788 -- -t envify -t babelify
scripts.start:interface:web: NODE_ENV=development ejs-cli src/ipads/interface/index.ejs > public/interface/index.html && NODE_ENV=development env-cmd .env  budo src/ipads/interface/index.js:bundle.js --port 9966 --cors --hot --live --dir public/interface --serve bundle.js -- -t [ envify --PLATFORM interface ] -t [ localenvify --envfile .env ] -t babelify
scripts.start:experiment:web: NODE_ENV=development ejs-cli src/ipads/experiment/index.ejs > public/experiment/index.html && NODE_ENV=development env-cmd .env budo src/ipads/experiment/index.js:bundle.js --port 9967 --cors --live --dir public/experiment --serve bundle.js -- -t [ envify --PLATFORM experiment ] -t [ localenvify --envfile .env ] -t babelify
scripts.start: npm-run-all -l -p start:interface:web start:interface:css start:experiment:web start:experiment:css start:electron start:electron:web start:electron:css start:electron:server
scripts.build:interface:js: NODE_ENV=production ejs-cli src/ipads/interface/index.ejs > public/interface/index.html && browserify src/ipads/interface/index.js -t [ envify --PLATFORM interface ] -t [ localenvify --envfile .env.prod ] -t babelify  | terser > public/interface/bundle.min.js
scripts.build:experiment:js: NODE_ENV=production ejs-cli src/ipads/experiment/index.ejs > public/experiment/index.html && browserify src/electron/index.js -t [ envify --PLATFORM electron ] -t [ localenvify --envfile .env.prod ] -t babelify  | terser > public/electron/bundle.min.js
scripts.build:electron:js: NODE_ENV=production ejs-cli src/electron/index.ejs > public/electron/index.html && browserify src/ipads/experiment/index.js -t [ envify --PLATFORM experiment ] -t [ localenvify --envfile .env.prod ] -t babelify  | terser > public/experiment/bundle.min.js
scripts.build:interface:css: postcss --config src/postcss.config.js src/ipads/interface/postcss/index.css -o public/interface/main.css && cssnano < public/interface/main.css > public/interface/main.min.css
scripts.build:experiment:css: postcss --config src/postcss.config.js src/ipads/experiment/postcss/index.css -o public/experiment/main.css && cssnano < public/experiment/main.css > public/experiment/main.min.css
scripts.build:electron:css: postcss --config src/postcss.config.js src/electron/postcss/index.css -o public/electron/main.css && cssnano < public/electron/main.css > public/electron/main.min.css
scripts.build: npm-run-all -l -s build:interface:js build:interface:css build:experiment:js build:experiment:css build:electron:js build:electron:css
